### Code

> Syntax highlighting tests

```handlebars
<article id="options-data">
  <h1 class="title">
    \{{title}}
    \{{foo.title}}
  </h1>
  <p class="description"> \{{foo.description}} </p>
</article>
```

```hbs
<article id="options-data">
  <h1 class="title">
    \{{title}}
    \{{foo.title}}
  </h1>
  <p class="description"> \{{foo.description}} </p>
</article>
```
